attributes.action: Close schools for 3 weeks to control the spread of covid 19 with online learning
attributes.additional_details: To keep our children safe without disrupting their education and engaging in classroom time or and webinars online whilst on lockdown
attributes.background: To show us you care about the children of this country with strict but short lockdowns during school holidays or when the risk is high.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
